General.Name: Dagi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Dagi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates in the garment industry in Turkey and internationally. It primarily produces and sells underwear, nighties, dresses, T-shirts, trousers, capri, shorts, sweatshirts, sportswear, thermal bottom and tops, maternity nightgowns, swimsuits, socks, and beach and homeware products for men, women, and children. The company sells its products through online and retail stores. Dagi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1984 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Birahane Sok. KoC Plaza No: 3/1, Istanbul, Turkey
